name: Hamburger
description: A patty of beef between two bread buns

name: Cheeseburger
description: A patty of beef between two bread buns + Cheese

name: Cheese Pizza
description: A pizza with sauce and cheese

name: Caesar Salad
description: A salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesean cheese and housemade caesar dressing

name: Cobb Salad
description: A "salad" made with Chicken, Bacon, Eggs, Lettuce, Tomatoes, Avacados, Cheese and Dressing

name: Orange Juice
description: Sweet, refreshing orange juice made with fresh squeezed oranges (or just Tropicana)

name: Orange
description: Progenitor of Orange Juice. Costs more than the orange juice so people will be tricked into buying the also overpriced juice.

name: Vodka
description: 1.5 Liters of 80 proof Vodka. Must finish entire bottle in one sitting.

name: Milk
description: A calcium rich drink that was made by a cow. Good for growing children or people with broken bones
